Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update repo URLs for org transfer + bug fixes

- Update all hardcoded URLs from prcasley to woodmont-industrial
- Fix dynamic copyright year in newsletter \(was hardcoded to 2025\)
- Remove duplicate fallbackThumbnail function in fetcher.ts

Files updated:
- src/build/static.ts: RSS/JSON feed URLs
- .github/workflows/update-articles.yml: Echo URLs
- src/feeds/pipeline.ts: User-Agent header
- README.md, GITHUB_SECRETS_SETUP.md, NEWSLETTER_SETUP.md: Doc links
- docs/PROJECT_REVIEW.md: All references
- copilot-agent.yml: Placeholder URLs
- src/server/newsletter.ts: Dynamic copyright year
- src/feeds/fetcher.ts: Remove unused function

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
